channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seeing Greene: Keep or Sell? What to Do When Your Rental Doesn’t Cash Flow
item.description: Should you move to invest in real estate? Perhaps you’re stranded in a pricey market or an area with unfavorable landlord-tenant laws. Depending on your career, you could earn a […]

item.title: Packing travel insurance products into an app helped FAYE to a $31M Series B
item.description: We’ve been covering US-based Insurtech startup FAYE way back since 2022 with its Seed round, and the Series A round in 2023, and it seems they continue to be on a roll, today announcing a $31 million in Series B funding. What is keeping this online insurance company on the rise? Well, it would appear […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: This Company Promised to Improve Health Care in Jails. Dozens of Its Patients Have Died.
item.description: Turn Key Health Clinics has quickly expanded to jails in 10 states. Some of its policies and practices have endangered patients.

item.title: How My Home Makes Me an Extra $1,400/Month (EVEN In an Expensive Market)
item.description: Wouldn’t it be nice if your home paid for itself? Every month, you throw a substantial sum of money towards your rent or mortgage payment, but what if you could […]

item.title: Sennder buys CH Robinson’s European business
item.description: Sennder is acquiring the European ground transportation assets of logistics giant C.H. Robinson. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What These Decisions Tell Us About Kamala Harris’ Approach to Criminal Justice
item.description: From the death penalty to school truancy and diversion programs, here are some key steps Harris took as a district attorney and attorney general.

item.title: My First Big-Time Deal Failed. Here’s Why I’m Happy About It.
item.description: I finally got my feet wet with a syndication deal, and it didn't go so well.

item.title: Egypt’s Cartona raises $8.1M even as investors pull back from B2B e-commerce in Africa
item.description: When Egyptian B2B e-commerce platform Cartona last raised money in 2022, global and local investors were eager to invest in African startups solving the supply chain and operational challenges for retailers and suppliers in the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) industry. Two years on, investors aren’t as enthused anymore as the business models of such startups, […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Raymond and Cassandra
item.description: Raymond Flanks spent nearly 39 years in Louisiana lockups for a murder he didn’t commit. Luckily, he found love with an old friend, Cassandra Delpit.

item.title: Home Insurance Rates Set to Increase Another 6% This Year. Here’s What Investors Should Know.
item.description: Home insurance rates are set to climb another 6% this year, and that's after a 20% gain over the past two years.

item.title: Qoo10’s CEO pledges personal assets worth $58M to compensate Korean merchants affected by its liquidity crisis
item.description: During an emergency hearing held by the South Korean government, Young-bae Ku, Qoo10's founder said he would secure the amount over the next 30 days. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Problem With Labeling Trump a ‘Felon’
item.description: Here’s why language used to describe any person convicted of crimes matters, and affects more than the former president.

item.title: Financial Freedom in 3 Years by Investing in “Boring” Rental Properties
item.description: Can rental properties replace your W2 income, lead you to financial freedom, and help you build multimillion-dollar wealth in the process? Yes, and Grant Francke is proof you can do […]

item.title: Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon chip aims to bring 5G to sub-$100 devices
item.description: Qualcomm has launched the Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chip to 5G smartphones in the sub-$100 price segment in India and other emerging markets. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Photos: Three Years of a Family’s Grief and Healing After a Fatal Police Shooting
item.description: Photographer Michael Indriolo documents an East Cleveland family’s search for peace after the 2021 police shooting of their 19-year-old brother.
